This is done by tracking all ideas provided on the platform and tying them to actual market-values in real-time. Also, ideas shared on the platform are normally accompanied by TP, SL, timeframe, allocation and analysis.​The result is that you get ideas that are very actionable, that also come from trusted investors with a track record you can see for yourself.
